      • fit

        public MultiLayerNetwork fit(java.lang.String path,
                    int labelIndex,
                    RecordReader recordReader,
                    int examplesPerFit)
        Train a multi layer network based on data loaded from a text file + RecordReader. This method splits the data into approximately examplesPerFit sized splits, and trains on each split. one after the other. See fitDataSet(JavaRDD, int) for further details.
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the text file
        labelIndex - the label index
        recordReader - the record reader to parse results
        examplesPerFit - Number of examples to fit on at each iteration
        Returns:
        MultiLayerNetwork

      • fitDataSet

        public MultiLayerNetwork fitDataSet(org.apache.spark.api.java.JavaRDD<DataSet> rdd,
                           int examplesPerFit)
        Fit the data, splitting into smaller data subsets if necessary. This allows large JavaRDD<DataSet>s) to be trained as a set of smaller steps instead of all together.
        Using this method, training progresses as follows:
        train on examplesPerFit examples -> average parameters -> train on examplesPerFit -> average parameters etc until entire data set has been processed
        Note: The actual number of splits for the input data is based on rounding up.
        Suppose examplesPerFit=1000, with rdd.count()=1200. Then, we round up to 2000 examples, and the network will then be fit in two steps (as 2000/1000=2), with 1200/2=600 examples at each step. These 600 examples will then be distributed approximately equally (no guarantees) amongst each executor/core for training.
        Parameters:
        rdd - Data to train on
        examplesPerFit - Number of examples to learn on (between averaging) across all executors. For example, if set to 1000 and rdd.count() == 10k, then we do 10 sets of learning, each on 1000 examples. To use all examples, set maxExamplesPerFit to Integer.MAX_VALUE
        Returns:
        Trained network

      • fitDataSet

        public MultiLayerNetwork fitDataSet(org.apache.spark.api.java.JavaRDD<DataSet> rdd)
        Fit the dataset rdd
        Parameters:
        rdd - the rdd to fitDataSet
        Returns:

      • evaluate

        public Evaluation evaluate(org.apache.spark.api.java.JavaRDD<DataSet> data,
                  int maxExamplesPerEvaluation)

      • evaluate

        public Evaluation evaluate(org.apache.spark.api.java.JavaRDD<DataSet> data,
                  int maxExamplesPerEvaluation,
                  boolean warnNotClassified)

      • evaluate

        public Evaluation evaluate(org.apache.spark.api.java.JavaRDD<DataSet> data,
                  int maxExamplesPerEvaluation,
                  java.util.List<java.lang.String> labelsList,
                  boolean warnNotClassified)
        Evaluate the network (classification performance) in a distributed manner.
        Parameters:
        data - Data to evaluate on
        maxExamplesPerEvaluation - Maximum number of examples to use during each evaluation step. If an executor has more than maxExamplesPerEvaluation, it will split the data into multiple evaluation steps. Results should not depend on this number (only affects memory requirements)
        Returns:
        Evaluation object; results of evaluation on all examples in the data set
